infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: TripTrack needs access to your calendar to help you organize and manage your trip schedules and reservations.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: TripTrack needs access to your contacts to help you share trip details with your travel companions.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: TripTrack needs access to your camera to capture and save receipts and travel documents.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: TripTrack needs access to your location to provide location-based trip recommendations and track your travel routes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: TripTrack needs access to your photo library to save and organize your travel photos and receipts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: TripTrack needs permission to save photos and receipts to your photo library.
